  Source   Edit

A temporary module that implements convenience routines for the PNode AST <-> MirTree translation.

Imports

../ast/ast_types, ../ast/ast_idgen, ../ast/ast, ../front/options, astgen, mirchangesets, mirconstr, mirtrees, mirgen, sourcemaps, utils, ../modules/modulegraphs, ../utils/astrepr

Procs

proc canonicalize(graph: ModuleGraph; idgen: IdGenerator; owner: PSym;
                  body: PNode; options: set[GenOption]): PNode {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, Exception, ValueError, ERecoverableError],
    tags: [RootEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
Legacy routine. Translates the body body of the procedure owner to MIR code, and the MIR code back to PNode AST.   Source   Edit 
proc echoInput(config: ConfigRef; owner: PSym; body: PNode) {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, Exception, ValueError], tags: [RootEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
If requested via the define, renders the input AST body and writes the result out through config.writeLine.   Source   Edit 
proc echoMir(config: ConfigRef; owner: PSym; tree: MirTree) {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, Exception], tags: [RootEffect].}
If requested via the define, renders the tree and writes the result out through config.writeln.   Source   Edit 
proc echoOutput(config: ConfigRef; owner: PSym; body: PNode) {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, Exception, ValueError], tags: [RootEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
If requested via the define, renders the output AST body and writes the result out through config.writeLine.   Source   Edit 
proc rewriteGlobalDefs(body: var MirTree; sourceMap: var SourceMap;
                       outermost: bool) {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Removes definitions of non-pure globals from body, replacing them with as assignment if necessary. The correct symbols for globals of which copies were introduced during transf are also restored here.

If outermost is true, only definitions in the outermost scope will be removed. This is a hack, but it's currently required for turning module-level AST into a procedure in a mostly transparent way.

  Source   Edit
